item.title: About
item.description: I’m Nived P A, currently a third year undergraduate at Amrita University majoring in Computer Science and Engineering with specialization in Artificial Intelligence. I’m also working as a Machine Learning intern at AfterShoot, a photo culling software tool for photographers. My main interests lie in domains related to Machine Learning and Deep Learning especially in the field of Computer Vision. Experiences ¶ AfterShoot Inc. (November 2021 - Present) ¶ Working on implementing Machine Learning models and algorithms for rating photos based on numerous visual attributes so that photographers can get their best shots instantly and automatically.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Send me an Email Connect with me on LinkedIn Find me on GitHub

item.title: Projects
item.description: Academic Projects ¶ List of projects I have completed as a part of various courses taken in college. Classification and Diagnosis of COVID-19 from Medical Images (May 2021) Implemented a supervised Convolutional Neural Network for classification of medical images for detecting the presence of Covid/Pneumonia affected lung images. We noticed that the models used for similar purposes at the time only worked with good accuracy on the training datasets, whereas on a different dataset that contained similar CT Scan images the accuracy was reduced to 60-70%.
